_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressEnd: You have reached the end of the list of page sections.
_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressIndicatorBar: Progress bar. Select here to view your current progress, and select an item to navigate to it. You have completed

_ariaLabels.accessibilityToggleButton: By selecting this button you can set whether accessibility is turned on or off

_accessibilityInstructions.ipad: Usage instructions for touchscreens. Use swipe left for next. Use swipe right for previous. Use a double tab to select. Use a two finger slide up to go to the top of the page. Usage instructions for keyboard access. Use left for next. Use right for previous. Use up and down together to select.
_accessibilityInstructions.notouch: Usage instructions. Use tab for next. Use shift tab for previous. Use enter to select. Use escape to go to the top of the page.
_accessibilityInstructions.touch: Usage instructions. Use swipe left for next. Use swipe right for previous. Use a double tab to select. Use a two finger slide up to go to the top of the page.

_textinput.ariaRegion: This question requires you to input your answer in the textbox provided. When you have done so, select the submit button below.

_accordion.ariaRegion: This component is an accordion comprised of collapsible content panels containing display text. Select the item titles to toggle the visibility of these content panels.

_mcq.ariaRegion: This is a multiple choice question. Once you have selected an option, select the submit button below

_narrative.ariaRegion: This component displays an image gallery with accompanying text. Use the next and back navigation controls to work through the narrative.

_hotgraphic.ariaRegion: Below is a component which allows you to select hot spots over an image. Select a hot spot to trigger a popup that includes an image with display text. Select the close button to close the popup.

_media.ariaRegion: This is a media player component. Select the play / pause button to watch or listen.
_media.transcriptButton: Alternatively you can select the link below for the transcript.

_buttons.disabledAriaLabel: This button is disabled at the moment

body: This is currently a demo. All sections have been unlocked for testing.
